metadata.notes: Data reflects Job 1 Order Guide. Key constraints include the temporary unavailability of 24-inch wheels on Platinum Ultimate. All-New redesigned model.

star_white_metallic_tri_coat.notes: Extra Cost. Not available on XL.

wild_green.notes: Available on Platinum 600A only with Stealth Appearance Package (60D) or Stealth Performance Package (19B).

3.5l_ecoboost_v6.availability: Standard on XL, Active, Platinum, and King Ranch.
3.5l_ecoboost_v6.restrictions: Standard Output. Includes Auto Start-Stop Technology.

3.5l_ecoboost_v6_high_output.availability: Standard on Tremor. Optional on Platinum.
3.5l_ecoboost_v6_high_output.restrictions: 440 HP / 510 lb-ft Torque. On Platinum, requires Stealth Performance Package (19B) or Platinum Ultimate Package (17A).

ford_co_pilot360_assist_2.0.description: Standard suite of driver assist technologies.
features: Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Stop & Go
Blind Spot Assist & BLIS with Trailer Coverage

bluecruise.description: Hands-free highway driving capability available in tiered plans.
features: BlueCruise Equipped (90-day Trial) - Standard on Active Touring (202A), Tremor (501A), Platinum (600A).
BlueCruise Equipped (1-year Plan) - Included with Platinum Ultimate (17A) and King Ranch (400A).
BlueCruise Equipped (One-Time Purchase) - Optional on Active Touring (202A), Tremor (501A), Platinum (600A), King Ranch (400A).

wheels.64X: 18-inch Dark Alloy Painted Aluminum (Standard XL, Active 200A)
wheels.64C: 20-inch Carbonized Gray Bright Machined Aluminum (Standard Active 202A)
wheels.64A: 22-inch Ebony Bright Machined Face (Driver's Pkg, Platinum Ultimate Substitute)
wheels.64Z: 24-inch Tarnished Dark Metallic (Platinum Ultimate - Temporarily Unavailable)

series_build_rules.description: Fleet-only SSV model available in Standard (U1G) and MAX (K1G) body codes.

safety_and_technology.digital_experience: Standard (Ford Digital Experience with Google built-in)

standard_equipment: Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow (Includes Class IV Hitch)

connectivity_package.name: Ford Connectivity Package (One-Time Purchase)
connectivity_package.description: Provides connectivity for a minimum of 7 years.

series_build_rules.description: Retail volume trim available in Select (200A) and Touring (202A) configurations.

safety_and_technology.bluecruise: 90-day Trial Included on 202A; Optional 1-year (55B) or One-Time Purchase (55C) on 200A and 202A.

touring_package_202A.description: Adds BlueCruise (90-day), ActiveX Seating, 20-inch Wheels (64C), Heated Steering Wheel, Power-Folding 2nd Row Captain's Chairs, 360-Degree Zone Lighting, Power Panoramic Vista Roof.
touring_package_202A.notes: Includes Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow and Integrated Trailer Brake Controller.

series_build_rules.description: Off-road focused trim with High Output engine and specialized suspension.

safety_and_technology.bluecruise: 90-day Trial Standard; Optional 1-year (55B) or One-Time Purchase (55C).

standard_equipment: 4x4 with Off-Road Mode and Rock Crawl
Off-Road Suspension with Premium Passive Shocks
Trail Control / Trail Turn Assist / Trail One Pedal Drive

series_build_rules.description: Luxury trim with premium materials and multiple appearance packages.

safety_and_technology.bluecruise: 90-day Trial Standard. 1-Year Plan Included with Platinum Ultimate (17A). Optional One-Time Purchase (55C).

standard_equipment: Heated/Cooled Front Seats & Heated 2nd Row Captain's Chairs

platinum_ultimate_package.description: Adds 3.5L HO Engine, 24-inch Wheels (Temporarily Unavailable), BlueCruise 1-Year, Luxury Leather, B&O Unleashed (22 Speakers).
platinum_ultimate_package.notes: 24-inch Tarnished Dark Wheel (64Z) is temporarily unavailable; must add 22-inch wheel (64A). Includes Driver's Package.

stealth_performance_package.description: Adds 3.5L HO Engine, 22-inch Magnetite Wheels (64B), Sport Tuned Suspension, Red Brake Calipers, Black Onyx Interior, Black Exterior Accents.
stealth_performance_package.notes: Includes Stealth Appearance Package (60D). Not available with Platinum Ultimate (17A).

stealth_appearance_package.description: Adds 22-inch Ebony Painted Wheels (64T), Black Badges, Black Onyx Interior, Black Roof Rails. Retains Standard Engine.

drivers_package.description: Adds 22-inch Wheels (64A), B&O Unleashed (22 Speakers), Continuous Control Damping.

series_build_rules.description: Western-themed luxury trim with unique leather and styling.
standard_equipment: Del Rio Leather Interior with Mesa/Ebony
